The user creates drops of water from an outside source, which are then shaped into razor-sharp [[wikipedia:lotus (genus)|lotus petals]]. As the petals expand in size and spin around, emitting explosive energy in every direction, they are launched at the opponent. The petals can be controlled and are able to kill a man with a single petal. [[Hisen]] noted it to be his strongest technique.

== Trivia ==
* The lotus petals make the atmosphere similar to a scene with a [[wikipedia:Japanese rock garden|zen garden]].
